misconceptions.inferred_category_name: No misconception detected (correct control-flow and output construction)
misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes that using a nested loop where the outer loop counts rows from 1..N and the inner loop prints that many '*' per row will produce the required right-triangle pattern.
misconceptions.conceptual_gap: There is no gap here: Java executes the outer loop once per row, and for each row the inner loop prints exactly the required number of asterisks, followed by a newline. This matches the specification.
misconceptions.error_manifestation: No error; output matches the required pattern for valid integer N.
